title: Mathematics Learning Design Utilizing Adaptive Hypermedia

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic operations and algebraic basics
context.additional_context: Collaboration learning utilizing personal devices in a BYOD environment for office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can solve math problems tailored to their proficiency level with over 80% accuracy via an adaptive hypermedia system.
Learners can complete a project expressing real-life problems as mathematical models through social constructivist discussions.
Learners can diagnose learning gaps based on system feedback and revise personalized learning paths at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
